scan_linter_check.description: It is possible to script REST messages directly. When doing so, using the .setBasicAuth method is considered a security risk. Doing so, the username and password are entered - unprotected - in server side scripting.
scan_linter_check.name: Avoid using setBasicAuth for REST messages
scan_linter_check.resolution_details: Apply methods like using a credentials record, or setup a REST message record and call this scripted.
scan_linter_check.short_description: Avoid using setBasicAuth for REST messages
scan_linter_check.sys_name: Avoid using setBasicAuth for REST messages
